title: game freeze
body: hey guys , so after the last update my game just freeze every time i get into the loading screen , sometimes it makes it for the first minute of the game then the whole PC freeze and i have to force restart it so it works again , ive lost 2 placements already cause of that ):

replies.body:
Did you install any Windows updates recently? If so, they may have enabled the *Game DVR* feature inside the Windows Game Bar. I recommend ensuring this feature is disabled using [**this guide.**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if this fixed it for you.
